summary: This mod adds the dragons from Addons Textures - Dragons to the leveled lists. The original download point for that modders resource is http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6120.
descriptionHtml:
Mod:  Addons Textures - Dragons - Playable 1_0_1
Game:  TES V: Skyrim                                          
Date:  7/31/12                   
************************************************************************
CONTENTS                          
************************************************************************
1. Information on the Mod
2. Installation
3. Version History
4. Conflicts, Known Issues, and Troubleshooting
5. Copy Status and Credits
************************************************************************
1. INFORMATION ON THE MOD           
************************************************************************
	   This mod adds the dragons from Addons Textures - Dragons to the leveled lists. The 
original download point for that modders resource is http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6120.

	   There are five different dragons, and they are added to the leveled lists alongside
the others so that all the dragons are still available.

	   There are two versions of the .esp.  One has unleveled dragons, level 10-50 average 
dragon level 20.  The other has leveled dragons much like vanilla Skyrim.

	   Or since this is a modders resource, you can just use it to copy the dragons into your
own mod.  	   
************************************************************************
2. Installation                           
************************************************************************
	   Chose if you want to use the version with the unleveled dragons or the version with 
the leveled dragons.  Install the appropriate .esp.  The .bsa is the same for either one.

           Extract (decompress) the .esp and .bsa to your Skyrim directory.  
(It will be something like *Installation directory*\\Skyrim\\SteamApps\\common\\Skyrim\\Data)
Mark the box next to the \"Addons Textures - Dragons - Playable\" plugin in your mod manager.
 
           Alternately, extract someplace else.  Then move the .esp and .bsa to Skyrim\\Data.  
Mark the box next to the plugin in your mod manager.
************************************************************************
3. Version History    
************************************************************************
V 1_0_1  7/31/12   Initial release.   
************************************************************************
4. Conflicts, Known Issues, and Troubleshooting
************************************************************************
	   This mod will conflict with mods that edit dragon leveled lists.  The dragons have 
their own meshes and textures and actor objects and do not overwrite existing dragons and conflict 
in that way.  (This mod does not act as a replacer.)	   

	   If you locate a bug, contact David Brasher on TES Nexus so that the situation can be
examined and can hopefully be fixed. 
************************************************************************
5. Copy Status and Credits           
************************************************************************
Credits:  Kjell Granlund for Addons Textures - Dragons @ http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6120
	
	  Bethesda for making Skyrim in an open format that anyone can mod.
		
Copy Status:  Modders resource.  Use for your mods.  Give credit to Kjell Granlund.           
************************************************************************
************************************************************************
************************************************************************
************************************************************************
author: Kjell Granlund
